translation.en: -[knock on door] -No, that's him right now, Mama.

translation.en: -Oh, okay, I'll call you back. -[phone beeps]

translation.en: Hey, what's up?
translation.zh: 嘿 你好吗？

translation.en: I just got off the phone with my mom.
translation.zh: 我刚跟我妈通电话

translation.en: Oh, you… you did? Yeah, what… what did she have to say?

translation.en: About…
translation.zh: 关于…

translation.en: Well, she just told me that you took her and my dad out to lunch.
translation.zh: 她刚刚告诉我 你带她和我爸爸出去吃午饭了

translation.en: It was a nightmare, okay? I totally blacked out. I fucked up.
translation.zh: 真是一场噩梦 好吧 我完全断片了 搞砸了

translation.en: I have no idea. I don't remember anything.
translation.zh: 我什么都不记得了

translation.en: Well, lucky for you, my parents remember everything.
translation.zh: 算你走运 我父母记得每一个细节

translation.en: Why would you take my parents to Roscoe's Chicken and Waffles
translation.zh: 你为什么要带我父母 去罗斯科的鸡肉和华夫饼店

translation.en: and without asking me?
translation.zh: 而不问我一下？

translation.en: I was taking a shot at something, okay? Just forget it.
translation.zh: 我在努力试着做点什么 好吗？算了

translation.en: Forget it? Oh, no, please, Ezra, keep going,
translation.zh: 算了？哦 不 拜托 以斯拉 继续说

translation.en: 'cause I would love to know about this little brilliant plan of yours.
translation.zh: 因为我很想知道你这个聪明的计划

translation.en: [exhales] You wouldn't understand, okay?
translation.zh: 你不会明白的 好吗？

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: -[Ezra] I was gonna take your parents out… -Wait, oh, my God.
translation.zh: -我本来要带你爸妈出去的… -等等 我的天啊

translation.en: -We were gonna have a great time, -Oh, my God. And then I was gonna ask their blessing,
translation.zh: 我们本来会玩得很好 然后我会求得他们的祝福

translation.en: and I had this whole cute proposal planned,
translation.zh: 我有这一整个很棒的求婚计划

translation.en: where I was gonna reenact our first few dates, but then it got messed up.
translation.zh: 我本来打算重演我们的第一次约会 但事情搞砸了

translation.en: -No, it's not messed up. It's not. -No, it is, 'cause your dad--
translation.zh: -不 没搞砸！ -不 搞砸了 因为你爸爸…

translation.en: -No, it's not. Ezra! Ezra! -Like, it's ruined.
translation.zh: -不 不是的 以斯拉！ -毁了

translation.en: -What? -You can still go through with it.
translation.zh: -怎么了？ -你还是可以继续的

translation.en: When?
translation.zh: 什么时候？

translation.en: -Now! Right now! -Like now?
translation.zh: -现在！现在！ -比如现在？

translation.en: Yes, right now.
translation.zh: 是的 现在

translation.en: -Right-- -Hurry up!
translation.zh: -现… -快点！

translation.en: Okay, I'm gonna take off my shoe so I don't crease it.
translation.zh: 好吧 我要脱鞋 免得被我弄皱了

translation.en: Amira… [exhales]
translation.zh: 阿米拉…

translation.en: -I love you so much. -Hmm.
translation.zh: 我好爱你

translation.en: I have never felt so understood by somebody in my entire life.
translation.zh: 我这辈子从没感觉到有人这么理解我

translation.en: I am blown away by your beauty
translation.zh: 我被你的美貌

translation.en: and your intelligence and your grace.
translation.zh: 智慧、风度震撼了

translation.en: And now you just do whatever you wanna do.
translation.zh: 以及你想做什么就做什么的性格

translation.en: And if you let me,
translation.zh: 如果你允许

translation.en: I will do everything in my power to give you the most beautiful life,
translation.zh: 我会竭尽所能 给你最美丽的生活

translation.en: filled with love and laughter and joy.
translation.zh: 充满爱、欢笑和开心

translation.en: Amira, will you marry me?

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 当然！

translation.en: You will?
translation.zh: 你会吗？

translation.en: -[Amira chuckles] Yes! -Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 对！ 我的天啊…

translation.en: Oh! Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 我的天啊！

translation.en: It's from the Holocaust, so that's why it's small.

translation.en: -[Amira] Oh, I love you. -I love you.
translation.zh: -我爱你 -我爱你

translation.en: [Amira] I need some color, look.
translation.zh: 我需要一些颜色 看

translation.en: Sorry it's so small.

translation.en: No, it's beautiful.

translation.en: So what's the story again? It's your grandmother's?

translation.en: Yeah, it's my grandmother's. It was her--

translation.en: She got it in the Holocaust or whatever.
translation.zh: 她卷进了大屠杀之类的

translation.en: But like, how old is she if it's from the Holocaust?
translation.zh: 但如果是大屠杀 那她多大年纪了？

translation.en: It's been a minute. I don't know.
translation.zh: 很久了

translation.en: I think she got engaged when she was, like, three or four years old.

translation.en: -It was a different time, you know. -So stupid.
translation.zh: -时代不一样 你知道吗？ -太蠢了

translation.en: -It was a different… -What is wrong with you? [laughing]
translation.zh: -时代不一样… -你怎么了？

translation.en: [Ezra] Don, known you my whole life. You've been an incredible boss.
translation.zh: 唐 我这辈子一直都认识你 你是个了不起的老板

translation.en: I grew up with your kids.
translation.zh: 我和你的孩子一起长大 我们去过家庭度假

translation.en: Been on family vacations together. You've always looked out for me.
translation.zh: 我和你的孩子一起长大 我们去过家庭度假 你总是很照顾我 你对我来说就像父亲

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Been like a father to me.
translation.zh: 你总是很照顾我 你对我来说就像父亲

translation.en: And working for you these past ten years has been life-changing.
translation.zh: 过去为你工作的十年改变了我的人生

translation.en: But it's time for a new adventure.
translation.zh: 但是时候开始新的冒险了

translation.en: That's it? That was great!
translation.zh: 就这样？太棒了！

translation.en: -That was really good. -An adventure in podcasting.

translation.en: Uh, maybe leave the podcast part out.
translation.zh: 也许把播客的部分删掉 你知道吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna throw up.

translation.en: No, wait, no, no, no. I'm sorry. I'm sorry. Listen.
translation.zh: 不 等等 抱歉 听着

translation.en: -Dude, I'm… [sighs] -Listen. Listen to me though. Relax.
translation.zh: -天啊 我… -听着 放轻松

translation.en: You're doing the right thing. You just gotta do it.
translation.zh: 你在做正确的事 你去做就好了

translation.en: You understand? You got the juice!
translation.zh: 你明白吗？你有胆识！

translation.en: Repeat that. "I got the juice."
translation.zh: 重复一遍 “我有胆识”

translation.en: I got the juice.
translation.zh: 我有胆识

translation.en: -I got the juice. -I got the juice.
translation.zh: -我有胆识 -我有胆识

translation.en: Say it with some nuts. I got the juice.
translation.zh: 坚定地说 我有胆识

translation.en: -I got the juice! -Believe in yourself!
translation.zh: -我有胆识！ -相信你自己！

translation.en: -I got the juice! -I'm not a buster. I got the juice.
translation.zh: -我有胆识！ -我不是笨蛋 我有胆识！

translation.en: I'm not a mark-ass buster like Don. I got the juice, bitch!
translation.zh: 我不是唐那样管别人借钱的混蛋！ 我有胆识 贱人！

translation.en: -Period. -Period!
translation.zh: -就这样 -就这样！

translation.en: Okay. Now, when you get home, we're gonna watch Juice,

translation.en: because I'm sure Shelley didn't let you watch Juice growing up.
translation.zh: 因为我肯定雪莉之前 没有让你看《胆识》

translation.en: That is so disrespectful.
translation.zh: 太无礼了

translation.en: -Is it? -I've seen Juice more than you.
translation.zh: -是吗？你看过吗？ -我比你看过的遍数多

translation.en: -Ooh! [laughs] -I love you.
translation.zh: -是吗？你看过吗？ -我比你看过的遍数多 我爱你

translation.en: -I love you. You got this, okay? -Thank you. All right.
translation.zh: -我爱你 你可以的 好吗？ -谢谢 好吧

translation.en: Come on, Don! You little bitch-ass Don!
translation.zh: 来吧 唐！你这个小贱人唐！

translation.en: I'm coming for you, Don!

translation.en: -Okay. -[Ezra] Come on!
translation.zh: -好吧 -来吧！

translation.en: [Don] I do not care, Javier.

translation.en: -[exhales] -[Don] Just get it!

translation.en: I don't give a rat's ass, okay? How about that?

translation.en: My Maserati sounds like it got gangbanged by the Toronto Raptors,

translation.en: so fix it!

translation.en: Jesus!

translation.en: What's up?

translation.en: -Cars, huh? -[Don sighs]

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: On… On that.
translation.zh: 那个…

translation.en: I, uh, I don't…

translation.en: I don't think I'm gonna--

translation.en: I think I'm gonna not come to work at this address…

translation.en: -What? -…anymore.

translation.en: What are you talking about?

translation.en: [splutters] At a different address, I'm gonna work--

translation.en: I'm not gonna work here at this address, so I'm gonna, like, do a different place

translation.en: that I'm gonna do the work from that's different work.

translation.en: Yeah. Goodbye.

translation.en: Pathetic. Who resigns in Helvetica?

translation.en: Wait, so you said, "Fuck you, Don"?

translation.en: Pretty much.

translation.en: He was like, "You're a great guy. And like, I'm sorry that--"

translation.en: "Like, I wish I did better in a weird way too."

translation.en: And I was like, "It's all good, but also like, don't…"

translation.en: -Period. -You know, period.

translation.en: Oh, I love that.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这个

translation.en: -To the juice. -To the juice!
translation.zh: -敬胆识 -敬胆识！

translation.en: All right.

translation.en: Let's talk wedding before I think too hard about what I actually just did.

translation.en: [inhales] Um, sure.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Huh. That's a super reassuring response.

translation.en: No, babe, I'm sorry.

translation.en: Look, you know I love you to death. I really do.

translation.en: I'm just a little worried.

translation.en: You know, since we got engaged and got the house, my family,

translation.en: they've just been on my head and not in a good way.

translation.en: So they hate me.

translation.en: -No! No, no, they don't. -Your family hates me.

translation.en: They just don't know you yet, you know. And I think…

translation.en: Look, this is gonna take some getting used to for them.

translation.en: I mean, and can you honestly say that your family's excited

translation.en: to have my Black ass in the picture?

translation.en: I think a good portion of them are.

translation.en: For sure.

translation.en: [sighs] All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Let me think about this.

translation.en: From where I'm sitting, I think there's only one thing left to do.

translation.en: -Which is very uplifting. -[Arnold] Alive.

translation.en: It really is.

translation.en: -And we are so thrilled about this. -[mother] Mm.

translation.en: -Mm! -[Shelley] I mean, they're just precious.

translation.en: So have you cuties made any, uh, wedding plans yet?

translation.en: You know, we've thrown some ideas around.

translation.en: Yeah, we're thinking something really small and intimate

translation.en: that really just represents us.

translation.en: Singer is in!

translation.en: [Shelley] Yeah, he'd be honored.

translation.en: Rabbi Singer.

translation.en: -[mother] Hmm. -So you're not gonna go with an imam?

translation.en: -[Amira hesitates] Um… -Who's Auntie Mom?

translation.en: -There's no Auntie Mom. It's an "imam." -Imam.

translation.en: Mm. I'm so sorry. Can you spell that for me?

translation.en: I'll spell it for you later. It's like a rabbi for Muslim people.

translation.en: -Thank you, Ezra. -[Arnold] Oh.
translation.zh: -谢谢你 以斯拉 -好

translation.en: -[mother chuckles] -Oh, so you're all Muslim?
translation.zh: 所以你们都是穆斯林？

translation.en: -Yes. -Oh, yes, very much so.
translation.zh: -是的 -哦 是的 非常虔诚

translation.en: I love it.
translation.zh: 我喜欢

translation.en: That's why I wear this crown.
translation.zh: 所以我才戴上这个王冠

translation.en: I love your crown. It's gorgeous.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你的王冠 很漂亮

translation.en: Babe, you wanna, um, tell them the story behind that crown?

translation.en: Well, this kufi that I'm wearing right now

translation.en: was actually a gift from the honorable Louis Farrakhan.

translation.en: Mmm! Love Farrakhan.
translation.zh: 我喜欢法拉肯

translation.en: You… You love Farrakhan?

translation.en: Love him. Can't get enough.

translation.en: He's… He's one of the GOATs. He's another one of the GOATs.
translation.zh: 他是历最佳的一员 他是另一个历最佳

translation.en: -Really? What do you love about Farrakhan? -Yeah, what do you love about Farrakhan?
translation.zh: 真的吗？你喜欢法拉肯的什么？ 是啊 你喜欢法拉肯的什么？

translation.en: Probably the same stuff that you do, just more stuff.
translation.zh: 可能跟你们差不多 更喜欢一点

translation.en: Can you be a bit more specific?
translation.zh: 你能说得具体一点吗？

translation.en: Yeah, um,
translation.zh: 好…

translation.en: I think what I love about him is his general vibe.
translation.zh: 我觉得我喜欢的是他整体的感觉

translation.en: -[Akbar] Ah. -He's got kind of a no-frills attitude.
translation.zh: 他的态度有点朴素

translation.en: And I just think he tells it like it's gotta be told sometimes.
translation.zh: 我只是觉得他说话的感觉 就是总要有人说出来

translation.en: -Just stop, babe. -For sure, yeah.

translation.en: [mother] Ooh! Oh, babe, maybe you should finish telling them

translation.en: about our private dinner with the minister.
translation.zh: 我们与牧师共进的私人晚餐的故事

translation.en: Oh, well, we were blessed to be in Brother Minister's company,
translation.zh: 好吧 我们有幸能陪伴牧师兄弟

translation.en: and, uh, I got to speak with him for maybe, like, an hour or so.
translation.zh: 我跟他聊了大概一个小时吧

translation.en: -Oh. -[Akbar] We talked about everything.
translation.zh: 我们无话不谈

translation.en: How far we've come and how far we have to go as a people.
translation.zh: 作为人 我们有了多少发展 还要进步多少

translation.en: No kidding.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: And at the end of the conversation, he actually took this kufi off
translation.zh: 谈话结束后 他把这个库菲圆帽取下来

translation.en: and put it on my head.
translation.zh: 然后放在了我的头上

translation.en: So this is one of my most treasured gifts.
translation.zh: 所以这是我最珍贵的礼物之一

translation.en: -Isn't that incredible? -Yes.
translation.zh: 很厉害吧？

translation.en: Are you familiar with, um, the minister's work?
translation.zh: 你熟悉牧师的工作吗？

translation.en: Well, I'm familiar with what he said about the Jews.
translation.zh: 我很熟悉他说的犹太人那些

translation.en: Let's have dinner. -Yeah. -I am fucking-- so fucking hungry.
translation.zh: 这样吧 我们一起吃晚餐吧 我好饿

translation.en: Let's get up and do it. Whoo!
translation.zh: 我们起来吃吧

translation.en: I found this great new Sirius station on the radio.

translation.en: -It's '90s West Coast bangers. -Hey! It has all the stuff.
translation.zh: 是90年代的西岸歌曲 里面有很多东西

translation.en: Yeah, Dad, I see you driving down Xzibit highway,
translation.zh: 对 爸爸 我看你开到了希比特高速

translation.en: and let's refocus it to this dinner that Amira made,
translation.zh: 让我们重新把注意力放回在 阿米拉做的这次晚饭上

translation.en: because she's a genius.
translation.zh: 因为她是个天才

translation.en: -[chuckles] Okay, well, let's dig in. -All right.
translation.zh: -好吧 我们开始吃吧 -好

translation.en: So wait, wait, wait, wait. We're not gonna say grace first?
translation.zh: 所以等等 我们不先做饭前祷告吗？

translation.en: -[Ezra] No, I mean, yeah. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 不 我是说… 对

translation.en: Oh, I was gonna say grace.
translation.zh: 我本来是想做祷告的

translation.en: -I mean, we say grace all the time, so… -All the time.
translation.zh: -我是说 我们一直在做祷告 所以… -一直如此

translation.en: [Ezra] Muslim style, so because you're here,
translation.zh: 穆斯林风格 所以…但如果你在这

translation.en: maybe out of respect, you would wanna lead.
translation.zh: 也许出于尊重 你会想要领导

translation.en: -[mother] Mm-hmm. -Well, I will do the honors.
translation.zh: 好吧 我会很荣幸地负责

translation.en: [Akbar] All praises be to Allah, who fed us and provided us with drink…
translation.zh: 给真主所有的赞美 他喂养了我们 给我们提供吃喝…

translation.en: [whispers] Close your eyes.
translation.zh: 闭上你的眼睛

translation.en: [Akbar] …and made us from among the Muslims.
translation.zh: …让我们成为穆斯林

translation.en: All praises be to Allah,
translation.zh: 给真主所有的赞美 他给我们提供了这些食物

translation.en: who fed me this and provided it for me
translation.zh: 给真主所有的赞美 他给我们提供了这些食物 不用我自己的任何能力就提供给了我

translation.en: without any power or might from myself.
translation.zh: 不用我自己的任何能力就提供给了我

translation.en: -Correct. -[Akbar speaking Arabic]
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: -Amin. -[Ezra] Definitely.
translation.zh: -阿敏 -绝对

translation.en: -Amin. -Amen.
translation.zh: -阿敏 -阿门

translation.en: -[all] Amin. -[Shelley splutters]
translation.zh: -阿敏 -阿敏

translation.en: I couldn't have said it better myself.
translation.zh: 我肯定说不出比这更好的话

translation.en: So, Ezra tells me that you guys used to have a boat growing up.
translation.zh: 所以 以斯拉告诉我 你们小时候有艘船

translation.en: [Shelley] Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: I was thinking that maybe one day
translation.zh: 我在想也许有一天 我们可以

translation.en: we can rent a boat and go out.
translation.zh: 我在想也许有一天 我们可以 租船出去玩 我们所有人

translation.en: -Hang out. -[Arnold] Oh.
translation.zh: 租船出去玩 我们所有人

translation.en: -All of us. -That would be really fun.
translation.zh: -那样很好玩 -我可以做到

translation.en: -I can make that happen. -We'll think about it.
translation.zh: -那样很好玩 -我可以做到 我们会考虑的

translation.en: Because Black folks don't really have a good relationship with boats.
translation.zh: 因为黑人和船没有很好的关系

translation.en: [laughing] That's very true. Or water.
translation.zh: 这倒是真的 或者水

translation.en: [chuckling] Kind of like Jews with trains, right?
translation.zh: 有点像犹太人和火车 对吧？

translation.en: -[Arnold] Wow. Bingo. -[Shelley] Hmm.
translation.zh: 哇 太对了

translation.en: [scoffs] Are you trying to compare the Holocaust to slavery?
translation.zh: 你是想把大屠杀和奴隶作比较吗？

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no, no, I'm not doing-- I mean, I wouldn't do that.
translation.zh: 不 我不是… 我是说 我不会那样做

translation.en: Al… Although, you know, if you think about it,
translation.zh: 不过你知道 如果你仔细想想

translation.en: I think the Blacks and the Jews have a similar struggle.
translation.zh: 我觉得黑人和犹太人有相似的挣扎

translation.en: -[Arnold] Hmm. -[Shelley] Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: No. So you are kind of sort of comparing the two.
translation.zh: 所以你有点在比较两者

translation.en: -Just a little bit. -Can you pass the potatoes this way, hmm?
translation.zh: -只是一点点 -你能把土豆递过来吗？

translation.en: Well, the Jews were technically the original slaves.
translation.zh: 犹太人严格来说是最初的奴隶

translation.en: -Right? OG slaves. -[Shelley] Oh, that's interesting.
translation.zh: -对吧？老帮奴隶 -有意思

translation.en: Oh, you going all the way back to Egypt.
translation.zh: 你要回到埃及那段历史吗？

translation.en: Okay, well, you do know that that was 3,500 years ago.
translation.zh: 好吧 你知道那是3500年前的事了

translation.en: Slavery is one great-grandparent away for us.
translation.zh: 奴隶制对我们来说 只有曾祖父母那么远

translation.en: -That is correct. -You know. My grandmother picked cotton.
translation.zh: 没错 我奶奶就摘棉花

translation.en: Well, Daddy, I don't think that they were trying--
translation.zh: 爸爸 我觉得他们不是在…

translation.en: -No, it's true, honey. -My grandmother picked cotton.
translation.zh: -不 这是真的 -我奶奶摘棉花

translation.en: I don't have to go back to Egypt. I just go back 75 years.
translation.zh: 我不用回埃及 我回到75年前

translation.en: You know, Jews make up one-half of 1% of the world's population,
translation.zh: 你知道 犹太人占世界人口1%的一半

translation.en: because we were systematically annihilated.
translation.zh: 因为我们被系统地摧毁了

translation.en: Exactly.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: The one and one-half percent of the population that you make up
translation.zh: 你们占据1%、0.5%的人口

translation.en: seems to be doing pretty good right now.
translation.zh: 现在似乎很好

translation.en: Uh, yeah, okay, but… [chuckles]
translation.zh: 是的 好吧 但是…

translation.en: Here's the thing. It's not like we don't work hard for it.
translation.zh: 问题是 我们并不是没有努力

translation.en: You know? I mean Arnold, he works super-duper hard in his practice.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？我是说阿诺德 他在诊所非常非常努力

translation.en: -He's a podiatrist. You do, honey. -And… And what did his father do?
translation.zh: 他是足病医生 是的 亲爱的 他父亲做的什么？

translation.en: He was a podiatrist.
translation.zh: 他是个足病医生

translation.en: And what about his father?
translation.zh: 那他的父亲呢？

translation.en: He was a… a podiatrist.
translation.zh: 他是…足病医生

translation.en: -Yeah, so… -[Arnold] Well.
translation.zh: 是的 所以 这有点…

translation.en: -And a bookie. -Yes, he did that on the side.
translation.zh: -还开赌局 -是的 他做那个当副业

translation.en: He went straight.
translation.zh: 他后来洗心革面了

translation.en: [Shelley] All I'm saying is that our people
translation.zh: 我只想说我们的人

translation.en: came here with nothing like everybody else.
translation.zh: 像其他所有人一样 只身来到这

translation.en: Actually, you kind of sort of came here
translation.zh: 其实你们来这里

translation.en: with the money that you made from the slave trade.
translation.zh: 带着像其他所有人一样 用奴隶贸易赚来的钱

translation.en: -What? Oh! -[Akbar] Preach.
translation.zh: -什么？ -说得好

translation.en: -Preach, Mother. Preach, Mother. -[Arnold] Holy moly.
translation.zh: 说得好 妈妈

translation.en: -Come on. -It's true. It's very tr--
translation.zh: -拜托 -这是真的

translation.en: -I would like to see your sources on that. -Baby, go get my purse.
translation.zh: -我想看看你的消息来源 -宝贝 去拿我的钱包

translation.en: I've got my slave receipts in my purse.
translation.zh: 我的钱包里有奴隶收据

translation.en: -Go get my purse. -[Akbar] Take that off the table.
translation.zh: 去拿我的钱包 我们不谈这个好吗？ 我不会每天打开新闻

translation.en: I don't turn on the news every day and see people in yarmulkes getting shot
translation.zh: 我们不谈这个好吗？ 我不会每天打开新闻 就看到戴着犹太圆顶小帽的人 被警察开枪打死

translation.en: by police because they was out minding their business.
translation.zh: 只是因为他们在忙自己的事

translation.en: Okay, first of all, you have no idea what you're talking about.
translation.zh: 只是因为他们在忙自己的事 首先 你们不知道自己在说什么…

translation.en: -A very uncomfortable conversation. -[chattering]
translation.zh: 这是个非常不舒服的对话

translation.en: Ever figure out what happened with the potatoes? An ETA on those?
translation.zh: 有没有想过土豆怎么样了？ 还有多久可以递给我？

translation.en: I'm trying.
translation.zh: 我在努力

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: I think we need to blow the candles out. I'm getting an allergic reaction.
translation.zh: 我们得吹灭蜡烛 我有过敏反应了

translation.en: Babe, can you move the candles?
translation.zh: 宝贝 你能把蜡烛移开吗？

translation.en: -Yes. -Can you get these candles out of here?
translation.zh: 当然了 好的 把蜡烛拿走 它们闻起来像屎

translation.en: -[Shelley] Yes. -Candles smell like shit.
translation.zh: 把蜡烛拿走 它们闻起来像屎

translation.en: -[chattering] -No, it's okay. I got it.
translation.zh: 不 没关系 我知道了

translation.en: When my grandmother was picking cotton, your grandfather's picking feet.
translation.zh: 我奶奶摘棉花的时候 你爷爷在弄脚

translation.en: Yes, I agree.
translation.zh: 我懂 我知道

translation.en: [Ezra] I just want you to sit down. I am hosting.
translation.zh: 妈妈 我只想让你坐下 我办的聚餐

translation.en: -[chattering] -No, no. There they go!
translation.zh: -你不知道要放哪里！ -让我帮忙吧

translation.en: I am supposed--
translation.zh: 我是想…

translation.en: -Oh, shit! Oh, shit! -[screaming]
translation.zh: 哦 靠！

translation.en: -Oh, shit! -[Ezra] Oh, shit! -Grab some water or something! -[Akbar] Oh, shit! What the fuck!
translation.zh: -靠！拿点水什么的！ -喂！搞什么？

translation.en: What are you doing? Hey! No!
translation.zh: 你在做什么？嘿！不！

translation.en: -[shouting] -No! No!
translation.zh: -对不起！ -住手！

translation.en: -Stop it! -I'm sorry! Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 它会烧掉房子的！对不起！ 我的天啊

translation.en: [mother] Oh, Lord.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 靠

translation.en: What are we gonna do?
translation.zh: 我们该怎么办？

translation.en: -About the kufi? It's gone, baby. -No, our parents.
translation.zh: -关于库菲圆帽的事？没有了 宝贝 -不 我们的父母

translation.en: Who cares?
translation.zh: 谁在乎？

translation.en: Like, we don't even have to worry about that.
translation.zh: 我们都不用担心这个

translation.en: I mean, your dad's intense, yeah, but we knew that going in.
translation.zh: 你爸爸很难搞 对 但我们早就知道会这样

translation.en: What is that supposed to mean?
translation.zh: 这是什么意思？

translation.en: Guess it's supposed to mean that he didn't smile or make one joke--
translation.zh: 就是他没笑 也没开过一个玩笑…

translation.en: Oh, wow. Are you trying to say that my dad's an angry Black man?
translation.zh: 哇 你是想说 我爸是个愤怒的黑人吗？

translation.en: I never said he was angry, no.
translation.zh: 我没说过他愤怒 没有

translation.en: Yeah, but you're saying a Black man is intense,
translation.zh: 没错 但你说一个黑人很难搞

translation.en: which is insinuating that he is.
translation.zh: 这就是暗示他愤怒

translation.en: He is Black, and he's intense.
translation.zh: 他是黑人 他很难搞

translation.en: Yeah, but you don't say that as a white person about a Black person,
translation.zh: 没错 但你作为一个白人 不能这样说一个黑人

translation.en: calling them "aggressive" or "intense."
translation.zh: 说他们“好斗”或者“难搞”

translation.en: That's being passive-aggressive saying that he's an angry Black man.
translation.zh: 这是在消极挑衅地说 他是个愤怒的黑人

translation.en: -Should I say he's not intense? -Say nothing about my dad.
translation.zh: -我应该说他不难搞吗？ -别说我爸的任何事

translation.en: If anyone should have any beef, it's with your mom.
translation.zh: 如果要怪任何人 那就怪你妈妈

translation.en: She set my dad's kufi on fire.
translation.zh: 她烧了我爸爸的库菲圆帽

translation.en: What's wrong with my mom? I mean, yeah, she's, like, an idiot,
translation.zh: 我妈怎么了？是的 她是有点白痴

translation.en: but she still, like, means well.
translation.zh: 但她还是没有恶意

translation.en: It's not like she did it on purpose.
translation.zh: 她又不是故意的

translation.en: Mm. Yeah, I don't know about that.
translation.zh: 行吧 这可不好说

translation.en: All right, I'm not gonna argue about something so ridiculous, okay?
translation.zh: 我不会为了这么荒谬的事吵架 好吗？

translation.en: [sighs] All right, let's talk about the rabbi.
translation.zh: 我们来聊聊拉比吧

translation.en: I don't think we need that. Let's just have a friend of ours do it.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们不需要请 找个我们的朋友来做吧

translation.en: [inhales] Um, I would like to use our imam.
translation.zh: 我想用我们的伊玛目

translation.en: Your imam?
translation.zh: 你们的伊玛目？

translation.en: Okay, Miss Shakur. When did you get so Muslim?
translation.zh: 好的 穆斯林活跃小姐 -你什么时候变得这么穆斯林了？ -我就是穆斯林 我出生就是穆斯林

translation.en: I've been Muslim. I was born Muslim.
translation.zh: -你什么时候变得这么穆斯林了？ -我就是穆斯林 我出生就是穆斯林

translation.en: And it's important to my dad, so I think we should go with it.
translation.zh: 这对我爸爸来说很重要 所以我觉得我们应该去做

translation.en: Was that Muslim bacon you ate yesterday? It actually was. It was Jewish bacon.
translation.zh: -你昨天吃的是穆斯林培根吗？ -其实是的 是犹太培根

translation.en: -Jewish bacon? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 是犹太培根吗？

translation.en: -I don't claim to be super Jewish. -Okay.
translation.zh: 我无法自称超级犹太人 我整天吃培根 我不在乎

translation.en: -I eat bacon all day. I don't care. -Okay. Well, so what? And?
translation.zh: 我无法自称超级犹太人 我整天吃培根 我不在乎 那又怎样？然后呢？

translation.en: -Yeah, you want an imam to marry us. -So?
translation.zh: -你想让伊玛目给我们证婚 -所以呢？

translation.en: Want me to face the bed towards Mecca?
translation.zh: 要我把床朝向麦加吗？

translation.en: -I can do that. -Actually, I do. Very much so.
translation.zh: -我可以 -其实我想 非常愿意

translation.en: Okay, cool, I love that four hours ago you became a devout Muslim.
translation.zh: 好的 我喜欢你四小时前 变成了虔诚的穆斯林

translation.en: -For sure. -Your dad's not even that Muslim!
translation.zh: -当然 -你爸爸都不是那么穆斯林！

translation.en: He heard "Fight the Power" once and changed his name from Woody to Akbar.
translation.zh: 他听过一次“与权力抗争” 就把他的名字从伍迪改成阿克巴了

translation.en: Okay, now you're going all out of line. Relax.
translation.zh: 好吧 现在你太过分了 别激动

translation.en: -You told me that. We joke about it. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 你是这么跟说的 我们还拿这件事开玩笑呢

translation.en: But I didn't tell you that for you to turn around and tell me.
translation.zh: 但我告诉你这个 不是让你用来反驳我的

translation.en: You're being-- Really, low-key, you're being an asshole.
translation.zh: 但我告诉你这个 不是让你用来反驳我的 真的 冷静 你现在有点混蛋了

translation.en: -I'm being an asshole? -Yes.
translation.zh: 我混蛋？ 是的

translation.en: -[Ezra] Okay. -[exhales]
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: You know what? I really-- I don't wanna fight. I can't.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？我不想吵架 我不能

translation.en: I don't wanna fight about it, okay?
translation.zh: 我不想因为这件事吵架 好吧？

translation.en: We just had too much going on tonight. I just… I can't.
translation.zh: 我们今晚发生太多事了 我真的… 我不能

translation.en: Me either. I don't wanna fight about it either.
translation.zh: 我也是 我也不想因为这个吵架

translation.en: [inhales] Look, I think our time would be best used
translation.zh: 听着 我觉得如果我们想着

translation.en: if we just think about how to move forward.
translation.zh: 怎样往前走 我们的时间 才能得到最好利用的

translation.en: I agree.
translation.zh: 我同意

translation.en: I'm gonna pitch that we just never speak to these people ever again
translation.zh: 我要提议 我们再也不跟这些人说话了

translation.en: and just a full, clean break.
translation.zh: 完全彻底地休息一下

translation.en: We cannot do that.
translation.zh: 我们不能那样做

translation.en: You know, I'm thinking that maybe if we spend more time with them together,
translation.zh: 我在想 或许我们多陪陪他们呢？

translation.en: maybe you and my dad can kind of hang out, just you and him.
translation.zh: 也许你和我爸爸可以一起出去玩 就你和他

translation.en: Sounds rad.
translation.zh: 听起来不错

translation.en: Then I think he can get comfortable with you, you know.
translation.zh: 然后他可以和你一起自在地相处

translation.en: And then maybe he'll see what we have going on.
translation.zh: 然后也许他会看到我们之间的情况

translation.en: Just might make him feel, you know… and you too.
translation.zh: 可能会让他感觉到 你知道… 你也是

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay.
translation.zh: 好的 好的

translation.en: -[sighs] -Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I gotta go to sleep. I started my period, and it's just been hell.
translation.zh: 我要睡觉了 我刚来月经 太难受了

translation.en: Yeah, I'm worried too,
translation.zh: 是啊 我也很担心

translation.en: 'cause I haven't gotten my period in, like, 35 years.
translation.zh: 因为我已经35年没来月经了

translation.en: -I should see a doctor or something. -[both laughing]
translation.zh: 我应该去看看医生什么的

translation.en: Amira told me that you gave up a job in finance
translation.zh: 阿米拉告诉我 你放弃了一份金融的工作

translation.en: so you could start a podcast.
translation.zh: 就是为了做播客

translation.en: [sighs] Yes, that is true. I know it sounds crazy.
translation.zh: 对 没错 我知道这听起来很疯狂

translation.en: Oh, so you do know that that sounds crazy?
translation.zh: 所以你知道这听起来很疯狂？

translation.en: Yes, yeah, I mean, I do. I mean--
translation.zh: 是的 我是说 我知道 我是说 但她…

translation.en: -You know it sounds crazy. -I do. I do, and she, you know…
translation.zh: 你知道这听起来很疯狂 我知道 而且她 你知道…

translation.en: Look, she's amazing, and she was like,
translation.zh: 听着 她很棒 她说：

translation.en: "Life is short, and you gotta follow your dream," you know.
translation.zh: “人生苦短 你要追寻自己的梦想” 你知道吗？

translation.en: How are you gonna support my daughter by following a dream?
translation.zh: 你要怎么支持我女儿追寻梦想？

translation.en: Do you have, like, some dream Bitcoin
translation.zh: 你有梦想的比特币

translation.en: or a dream 401(k) or some shit?
translation.zh: 或者梦想的退休金账户之类的吗？

translation.en: I don't have a dream 401(k).
translation.zh: 我没有梦想退休金账户

translation.en: But I am gonna give it everything I have.
translation.zh: 但我会全力以赴

translation.en: [accented] You're gonna give it everything you've got?
translation.zh: 你要全力以赴吗？

translation.en: That sounds like some white boy shit.
translation.zh: 听起来真是白人小子胡说八道

translation.en: "I'm gonna give it everything I've got!"
translation.zh: “我会全力以赴！”

translation.en: [Ezra] Yeah, I see it. I can handle the jokes like that, for sure.
translation.zh: 是的 我明白了 我当然能应付这样的笑话

translation.en: [Akbar] I'm not joking.
translation.zh: 我不是在开玩笑

translation.en: No, I know you're not joking. I think that's-- I'm saying you're doing a good--
translation.zh: 不 我知道你不是在开玩笑 我是说你在做一个很好…

translation.en: I'm not trying to do shit. I'm saying what you just said.
translation.zh: 我不是在做什么 我是在说你刚才说的话

translation.en: [Ezra] Right. You weren't doing an impression.
translation.zh: 没错 你不是在滑稽模仿我

translation.en: Again, I wasn't saying you were doing an impression.
translation.zh: 再说一次 我没有说你在滑稽模仿我

translation.en: [Akbar] Nigga, I don't do impressions.
translation.zh: 兄弟 我不会滑稽模仿别人的

translation.en: I don't think-- I don't even-- I don't think you do impressions.
translation.zh: 我不觉得… 我都没有… 我不认为你…

translation.en: [Shelley] You know, I really did enjoy meeting your parents the other night,
translation.zh: 你知道 我真的很喜欢 那天晚上和你父母的见面

translation.en: but I felt so horrible about your father's kufi.
translation.zh: 但我对你父亲的库菲圆帽感觉很愧疚

translation.en: -You know? -[sighs]
translation.zh: 你知道吗？

translation.en: I… I actually… I have a little piece of it left,
translation.zh: 其实还剩一小块 就在我那里

translation.en: and I was thinking maybe I could frame it or something.
translation.zh: 我在想 或许我可以裱起来之类的

translation.en: -Oh, no. It's okay. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 不用了 没关系

translation.en: -You sure? I could take it to Michaels. -Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: 你确定吗？我可以把它带到手工店里

translation.en: And they actually do a pretty good job.
translation.zh: 他们真的做得很好

translation.en: You wouldn't think it for a craft store, but they do.

translation.en: -[mother] "S." -Good.

translation.en: -Oh, strippers! Strippers! -[woman] Too many letters.

translation.en: Oh, wait. Oh, no, no, no, I've got it.

translation.en: Is it an "n" word?

translation.en: [Shelley] No.
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: No, no. I meant N-Navajos.

translation.en: -[woman] Oh, jeez. -[Shelley] No, that's where I was going.

translation.en: Was Navajos, because, um…
translation.zh: 不 那是我想说的 是纳瓦霍人 因为 你们知道 当他们动纳瓦霍的时候…

translation.en: -You know, when they move, the Navajo-- -[Liza] Mom.
translation.zh: 因为 你们知道 当他们动纳瓦霍的时候…

translation.en: Mom, please.

translation.en: [Shelley] What?

translation.en: -Oh. Dancers! -[screaming]

translation.en: Oh, my God!

translation.en: What the hell!
translation.zh: 什么鬼？

translation.en: What the hell is wrong with you?
translation.zh: -你怎么了？ -天啊！

translation.en: -[woman 2] Oh, my God! -[shouts]

translation.en: No, no!

translation.en: [woman 2] It's okay. Your braids look good.

translation.en: It's hooked onto my…
translation.zh: 挂在我的…

translation.en: -It's okay. Somebody get her a wig. -[chattering]

translation.en: -Did you know this was a wig? -No, I… I didn't know that.
translation.zh: -你知道这是假发吗？ -不 我不知道

translation.en: I mean, this… this is kind of amazing craftsmanship, don't you think? Because--
translation.zh: 我是说 这是一种很棒的手艺 你不觉得吗？

translation.en: -Gimme the girl's wig back. Gimme the wig. -What--

translation.en: -Now it's all tangled up. -[woman 3] You're okay.
translation.zh: -现在一切都缠上了 -你没事的

translation.en: -[woman 1] Let's go! -[woman 2] Okay.
translation.zh: -我们走！ -好

translation.en: What ha--
translation.zh: 什么情…

translation.en: -[Ezra] Was your trip as bad as mine? -[Amira] I guess you could say that.

translation.en: [exhales] Yeah, mine was rough.

translation.en: Did your dad say anything?

translation.en: No. Why? Should he?

translation.en: No, just that, uh, everything went okay,
translation.zh: 不 只是一切都正常

translation.en: and it was totally normal, so, yeah.
translation.zh: 不 只是一切都正常 完全正常 所以 对

translation.en: -Okay. -Why was yours rough? 'Cause my mom?
translation.zh: -好的 -你的为什么艰难？因为我妈妈？

translation.en: [Amira sighs] I don't wanna talk about it.
translation.zh: 我不想谈这件事

translation.en: [scoffs] What'd she do this time?

translation.en: Ezra, I don't-- I really don't wanna talk about it.

translation.en: Just tell me what she did.
translation.zh: 告诉我她做了什么

translation.en: [sighs] Okay, she pulled the same tone-deaf shit she does all the time.
translation.zh: 好了 她有说了那种考虑不周全的话

translation.en: But that's what y'all do, so…
translation.zh: 但你们都那样 所以

translation.en: What type of shit is that to say?

translation.en: I'm sorry. I just got a lot on my mind.
translation.zh: 对不起 我脑子里有很多事

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: [Ezra sighs] Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Whoa, whoa. What are you doing?
translation.zh: 哇 你在做什么？

translation.en: -Throwing this shit away. -Why?
translation.zh: -把这东西扔掉 -为什么？

translation.en: Because I didn't get the job, Ezra. That's why.
translation.zh: 因为我没得到这份工作 以斯拉 这就是原因

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: The producer called me and told me that he went with someone else.

translation.en: Someone who has more period piece experience. I don't know.

translation.en: [Ezra] Baby, I'm sorry.

translation.en: If it's any consolation, I can hold you down for a while.

translation.en: [scoffs] No, Ezra, I don't wanna be some kept woman.
translation.zh: 不 以斯拉 我不想靠男人养活

translation.en: I'm just trying to think of ways to help you, all right?

translation.en: Like… [sighs]
translation.zh: 就像是…

translation.en: -Let me-- -[Amira sighs] Let me call my family friend Rick Greenwald.
translation.zh: 让我给我们家族的朋友 里克·格林沃德打个电话

translation.en: He's got connections, and he'll look out for you on your next job.

translation.en: Oh, the fucking luxury.
translation.zh: 真他妈的奢侈

translation.en: Are you not listening to what I'm saying? Are you not hearing me?
translation.zh: 你没听我说话吗？你没听到吗？

translation.en: Everything I have, I've gotten on my own.
translation.zh: 我拥有的一切 我都靠的自己

translation.en: I've worked really hard for it
translation.zh: 我真的很努力争取到的

translation.en: and worked through all this racist bullshit,
translation.zh: 克服了这么多种族歧视

translation.en: all for you to be able to come in and call your family friend to give me a job
translation.zh: 一切都是为了你插手进来 然后给你 家族朋友打电话 给我一份工作

translation.en: I probably should have got five years ago?
translation.zh: 我大概五年前就该这样了？

translation.en: How do you think that makes me feel?

translation.en: Well, I'm not trying to make you feel bad. I'm just trying to, like, help.

translation.en: And it's okay to accept help from someone who loves you.

translation.en: That's really easy for you to say because that's how life has worked for you.
translation.zh: 你这么说很容易 因为你的生活就是这样

translation.en: That's not how it works for me.
translation.zh: 对我来说不是这样的

translation.en: Whatever. We have to get ready for this rehearsal dinner.

translation.en: I'm going to the bathroom. Alone.

translation.en: Please.
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: Yeah, I don't wanna go to the bathroom with you.

translation.en: [Amira] Since when?

translation.en: My charger's in there though.
translation.zh: 但我的充电器在里面

translation.en: Let me just grab my charger before you're in there for a while.

translation.en: [Amira] Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 我的天啊！

translation.en: -Woody! -Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey!
translation.zh: 伍迪！

translation.en: My name is Akbar Mohammad, bro.
translation.zh: 我叫阿克巴·穆罕默德 兄弟

translation.en: Oh, man. Mama named you Woody. I'm calling you Woody.

translation.en: Yeah, Mama didn't give birth to no fake-Versace-wearing,

translation.en: PPP-loan-scamming career criminal, but here we are.
translation.zh: 工资保障计划贷款诈骗的职业罪犯 但我们就在这

translation.en: This is Versace.
translation.zh: 这是范思哲

translation.en: Nigga, please.
translation.zh: 兄弟 拜托

translation.en: Anyway, I ain't no criminal, okay?
translation.zh: 总之 我不是罪犯 好吗？

translation.en: It was a peeping Tom charge, okay?

translation.en: I was looking in there, peeping to see if my baby mama was cheating,
translation.zh: 我在看里面 偷看我的孩子妈妈有没有出轨

translation.en: so I could get lower prices on my child support.
translation.zh: 这样我就能在抚养孩子上拿少点钱了

translation.en: Why peep through the window?

translation.en: Because I wanted to see somebody have her broke down over, like a shotgun.

translation.en: That ain't gonna lower your child support.

translation.en: The judge seen her being a ho, my child support will go low.

translation.en: Can't go up in the judge, "I seen her bent over, Your Honor."

translation.en: "I should get less."

translation.en: [chuckles] The judge ain't gonna give you less money.

translation.en: I've done it before.

translation.en: -Oh. He lying. -[chuckling]

translation.en: -[laughs] All right. -All right. Okay.

translation.en: Come back soon if you want.

translation.en: Tell him, Ezra.

translation.en: About what?

translation.en: [EJ laughs] You gotta get that money some kind of way, baby, huh?

translation.en: This is nice, y'all. This is real nice.
translation.zh: 这真不错 各位 这很不错

translation.en: I ain't never had no, uh, wedding like this,

translation.en: but I mean, I've been married three times. That's right.
translation.zh: 但我已经结婚三次了 没错

translation.en: Two times at the courthouse
translation.zh: 两次在法院

translation.en: and then one time at the Benihana's. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 一次在贝尼哈纳

translation.en: We ain't had no reservations, nothing like that.

translation.en: Girl, we just wanna say congrats. You marrying this white man.

translation.en: -Girl, all these white people are here. -[scoffs]
translation.zh: 姑娘 这些白人都来了

translation.en: If you like it, we love it, right? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 只要你喜欢 我们就喜欢 对吧？

translation.en: -I stormed the Capitol. -[crowd gasps]
translation.zh: 我冲进了国会大厦

translation.en: I did. I was there.
translation.zh: 是的 我当时在那里

translation.en: Ezra tried to stop me.
translation.zh: 以斯拉想阻止我的

translation.en: He's a liberal cuck, but he's a good man.
translation.zh: 他是个自由主义者 但他是个好人

translation.en: To my best friend Ezra, who's kind and thoughtful,
translation.zh: 敬我最好的朋友以斯拉 他很友好又有想法

translation.en: but for whatever reason didn't think to sit me on the Black side of the table,
translation.zh: 但没想过 让我坐在我们黑人这边的桌子

translation.en: which just aesthetically makes sense, you know.
translation.zh: 这在审美上是合理的 你们知道吧？

translation.en: Cheers to inclusion and our newly found generational wealth.
translation.zh: 为包容和我们新发现的世代财富干杯

translation.en: "He left the family early, um,
translation.zh: 他很早离开了家

translation.en: leaving his mother responsible for everybody, including the house."
translation.zh: 让他的妈妈负责所有人 包括房子

translation.en: "And after Mom died in 1984,
translation.zh: 在妈妈1984年去世之后

translation.en: Xzibit had no choice but to move in back with his father in New Mexico."
translation.zh: 希比特别无选择 只能搬到 新墨西哥州和他爸爸一起住

translation.en: I… I wanna say… I wanna say it was Albuquerque.
translation.zh: 我想说… 我想说这是阿尔伯克基

translation.en: -Okay. I think we can wrap it up. Yeah. -I think.
translation.zh: 好 我想我们可以结束了 对

translation.en: That vaccine…
translation.zh: 那个疫苗…

translation.en: makes you gay.
translation.zh: 让你变成同性恋

translation.en: So the moral of the story is
translation.zh: 所以故事的主旨是

translation.en: never date a woman who don't respect your wife.
translation.zh: 永远不要和一个 不尊重你妻子的女人约会

translation.en: No, I didn't mean to-- I said the wrong shit. [sighs]
translation.zh: 不 我不是故意的… 我说错话了

translation.en: Can I have everybody's attention, please?
translation.zh: 大家能听我说几句吗？

translation.en: Attention, everyone.
translation.zh: 大家注意一下

translation.en: Yeah, I know it's, uh, it's customary for the father to give a speech on the wedding day.
translation.zh: 是的 我知道在婚礼当天 父亲做讲话是习俗

translation.en: But I thought there was some things that I needed to, uh, address tonight.
translation.zh: 但我觉得今晚我要强调一些事情

translation.en: when a man's daughter gets married,
translation.zh: 当一个男人的女儿结婚了

translation.en: they say that the man is giving her away.
translation.zh: 他们会说这个男人把她送走了

translation.en: Now, that's a really hard pill to swallow.
translation.zh: 这种滋味确实不好受

translation.en: Because you don't usually know
translation.zh: 因为你通常不知道

translation.en: who the man is that you're giving your daughter away to.
translation.zh: 你要把你的女儿送出去 给的那个男人什么样

translation.en: Usually.
translation.zh: 通常来说是这样

translation.en: But I consider myself fortunate,
translation.zh: 但我觉得自己很幸运

translation.en: because I think I kind of do know who Ezra is.
translation.zh: 因为我觉得我知道 以斯拉是什么样的人

translation.en: And he's not a drunken, drugged-out, dream-chasing whore monger
translation.zh: 而他不是个醉鬼、吸毒、嫖娼的人

translation.en: who surrounds himself with a bunch of, uh, racist degenerates.
translation.zh: 不会和一群种族主义堕落的人在一起

translation.en: I didn't get that guy.
translation.zh: 我没遇到那个家伙

translation.en: I got this guy.
translation.zh: 我遇到了这个家伙

translation.en: [EJ] All right, okay, okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: So, here's to my beautiful baby girl.
translation.zh: 所以 敬我美丽的宝贝女儿

translation.en: -[all] Cheers! -[mother] We love you.
translation.zh: 干杯！ -我们爱你！ -恭喜你

translation.en: [Shelley] Congratulations!
translation.zh: -我们爱你！ -恭喜你

translation.en: Thank you, sir.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 先生

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Oh, Ezra.
translation.zh: 以斯拉

translation.en: Thank you for, uh, what you did back there.
translation.zh: 谢谢你刚才在那里做的

translation.en: What did I do back there?
translation.zh: 我在那里做了什么？

translation.en: Your speech.
translation.zh: 你的演讲

translation.en: You could've, uh, could've blown up my spot.
translation.zh: 你本可以曝光我的错误

translation.en: You didn't, so thanks.
translation.zh: 但你没有 所以谢谢

translation.en: Well, save your thank you, 'cause I didn't do it for you.
translation.zh: 好吧 不用谢 因为我不是为了你

translation.en: I did that for my daughter.
translation.zh: 我这么做是为了我女儿

translation.en: You think I'm gonna embarrass her in front of her whole family?
translation.zh: 你觉得我会在她家人面前 让她难堪吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不会

translation.en: You don't know me too well.
translation.zh: 你不太了解我

translation.en: But here's the thing. I know you.
translation.zh: 但问题是 我了解你

translation.en: I've known you from the very start.
translation.zh: 我从一开始就了解你

translation.en: I had your number from day one.
translation.zh: 我从开始就有你的电话号码

translation.en: And for the life of me,
translation.zh: 对我而言 我不知道为什么我女儿

translation.en: I do not know why my daughter continues to go down this path with you.
translation.zh: 对我而言 我不知道为什么我女儿 要继续和你走这条路

translation.en: There's one thing that I'm crystal clear on,
translation.zh: 我很清楚一件事

translation.en: is that you are absolutely, positively, unequivocally
translation.zh: 那就是你很确定、绝对、明确的

translation.en: not the right the guy for my daughter.
translation.zh: 对我女儿而言不是正确的人

translation.en: Period.
translation.zh: 就这样

translation.en: -Why? -Excuse me.
translation.zh: -为什么？ -什么？

translation.en: Why am I not the right guy for your daughter?
translation.zh: 为什么我不适合你女儿？

translation.en: Well, shit, where do I begin?
translation.zh: 好的 我该从哪里开始？

translation.en: Anywhere.
translation.zh: 哪里都可以

translation.en: Well, what… what about we start at your bachelor party?
translation.zh: 那我们从你的单身派对开始吧

translation.en: When I saw you in the room with the strippers and the cocaine,
translation.zh: 我看到你在房间里 有脱衣舞娘和可卡因

translation.en: how about we start there?
translation.zh: 我们从这里开始如何？

translation.en: Why don't we start with
translation.zh: 不如我们从

translation.en: why you were at my bachelor party in the first place?
translation.zh: 一开始你为什么要来 我的单身派对开始？

translation.en: You had no right to be there. Bachelor parties are for people to be weird.
translation.zh: 你没有资格去那里 单身派对就是为了让人们变得奇怪

translation.en: That's not who I am.
translation.zh: 那不是我本来的样子

translation.en: Okay? It's my dumb fucking friends.
translation.zh: 好吧？是我该死的蠢朋友

translation.en: But you deeboed your way in, and you got what you wanted.
translation.zh: 可是你进去了 也达到你的目的了

translation.en: I had a shitty time.
translation.zh: 我过得很糟糕

translation.en: As a matter of fact, I have a shitty time whenever you're around.
translation.zh: 事实上 只要你在我身边 我就过得很糟糕

translation.en: You're like the cooler to my life, and I don't know why.
translation.zh: 你像是毁掉我生活的人 我不知道为什么

translation.en: Because the truth is all I've ever done
translation.zh: 因为事实是 我所做的都是

translation.en: is love your daughter,
translation.zh: 爱你的女儿

translation.en: wholly and completely.
translation.zh: 完整而完全的爱

translation.en: And she loves me,
translation.zh: 而且她爱我

translation.en: and we wanna marry each other.
translation.zh: 我们想和彼此结婚

translation.en: And you just decided before you even met me
translation.zh: 你在见到我之前就决定了

translation.en: that you hated me.
translation.zh: 你恨我

translation.en: [scoffs] And then once you met me, you put all your energy
translation.zh: 然后你一见到我 你就把所有精力都花在了发掘我上面

translation.en: just towards, like, smoking me out
translation.zh: 你就把所有精力都花在了发掘我上面

translation.en: or trying to prove I don't belong around Black people,
translation.zh: 或者试图证明我不属于黑人

translation.en: or that I'm a researcher and not a witness.
translation.zh: 或者我是研究者 不是目击者

translation.en: That's why you brought me to play ball at that park.
translation.zh: 所以你带我去公园玩球

translation.en: Why you brought me to that Crip barbershop while I'm wearing a red hoodie like an idiot.
translation.zh: 所以你带我去那个理发店 让我像傻子一样穿着一件红色卫衣

translation.en: It's why you fuck with me about my podcast and my music taste and how I talk
translation.zh: 所以你才跟我说我的播客 我的音乐品味和我说话的方式

translation.en: and how I think and who my friends are
translation.zh: 以及我思考的方式和我的朋友是谁

translation.en: and basically everything that I'm a part of.
translation.zh: 基本上是我参与的一切

translation.en: And I just take it. I take it!
translation.zh: 我就接受了 我接受！

translation.en: I take your shit. I take it all day.
translation.zh: 我接受你的做法 我整天都在接受

translation.en: And it did teach me one thing that you were right about.
translation.zh: 它教会了我一件事 你说对了

translation.en: [Akbar] And what's that?
translation.zh: 那是什么？

translation.en: I will never, ever, ever
translation.zh: 我永远不会

translation.en: know what it's like to be a Black person in this country.
translation.zh: 知道在这个国家当黑人是什么感觉

translation.en: But I do know what an asshole is.
translation.zh: 但我知道混蛋什么样

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, I know.
translation.zh: 对 我知道

translation.en: I'm really pleased with the way-- and they're such a nice group of--
translation.zh: 我真的很满意 他们是一群好…

translation.en: Oh, Amira! Amira. Hi!
translation.zh: 阿米拉！嗨！

translation.en: Would you excuse me for just a second?
translation.zh: 失陪一下 好吗？

translation.en: -Oh, my gosh! -[Amira] Hi.
translation.zh: -我的天啊！ -嗨

translation.en: Hi! I just wanted to stop you and tell you that I think you look so pretty.
translation.zh: 嗨！我只是想让你停下 告诉你我觉得你很漂亮

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Is that a roller set?
translation.zh: 那是湿卷吗？

translation.en: -Hmm? -Your hair. Is it a roller set?
translation.zh: 你的头发 是湿卷吗？

translation.en: Um, no, it's not.
translation.zh: 不 不是

translation.en: Oh. Shoot. Okay. It's not individuals, right?
translation.zh: 好了 也不是小辫子 对吧？

translation.en: [Amira] No.
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: No? Okay. Shit.
translation.zh: 不是吗？好吧 靠

translation.en: All right, well, I guess I'm gonna have to go back to the drawing board.
translation.zh: 好吧 我想我得回去看看画板了

translation.en: I, uh-- Ever since the bachelorette party…
translation.zh: 自从单身派对以来

translation.en: …I just did this really deep dive on Black women's hair.
translation.zh: 我就对黑人的头发沉迷了

translation.en: And, um, oh, for example, I watched the Chris Rock documentary.
translation.zh: 比如说 我看了 克里斯·洛克的纪录片

translation.en: I don't know if you've had a chance to see it. It's absolutely fantastic.
translation.zh: 我不知道你有没有看过 非常棒

translation.en: And he's so funny.
translation.zh: 他很好笑

translation.en: There's something about his voice that always makes me laugh.
translation.zh: 他的声音总是让我笑

translation.en: But anyway, there's nothing funny about Black women's hair, you know.
translation.zh: 但不管怎样 黑人女性的头发 没什么好笑的 你知道吧？

translation.en: I mean, my God, I just had no idea.
translation.zh: 但不管怎样 黑人女性的头发 没什么好笑的 你知道吧？ 我的天啊 我真的不知道

translation.en: I mean, it really blew my mind.
translation.zh: 我是说 我真的很吃惊

translation.en: You know, the energy and the time
translation.zh: 你知道 黑人女性所经历的

translation.en: and the… the pain and the suffering that Black women go through.
translation.zh: 能量、时间和痛苦

translation.en: And so, anyway, I just wanted to be well-versed
translation.zh: 所以 无论怎样 我想在下次见到你时

translation.en: for when I saw you next, and I'll let you get back to it.
translation.zh: 我想要精通这个 那你继续忙吧

translation.en: Yeah, and-- but before you go, can you just tell me…
translation.zh: 对 在你走之前 你能告诉我…

translation.en: [exhales] What is this style? Just so I know for next time.
translation.zh: 这是什么款式吗？ 这样下次我就知道了

translation.en: -Shelley, I'm not a toy. -[Shelley] Because I--
translation.zh: 雪莉 我不是一个玩具

translation.en: I really don't appreciate you treating me
translation.zh: 我真的很不喜欢你把我当成

translation.en: like some shiny little object you can show off to your friends.
translation.zh: 可以跟朋友炫耀的小物件

translation.en: Oh, no, I would never do anything like that.
translation.zh: 我从没做过那种事

translation.en: -[Amira] No, you are. -No--
translation.zh: -不 你有 -不…

translation.en: -[Amira] Just let me finish. Yes, you do. -Oh, no, I--
translation.zh: 你能让我说完吗？是的 你有

translation.en: Since I met you, I've been nothing but kind and respectful.
translation.zh: 自从我认识你之后 我一直都只有友好和尊重

translation.en: And it's starting to feel like
translation.zh: 开始觉得像是

translation.en: you're all happy that you have this Black daughter-in-law
translation.zh: 你们有了 这个黑人儿媳妇之后很开心

translation.en: now that it's cool to care about Black people.
translation.zh: 现在关心黑人是很酷的

translation.en: I bet every time we hang out, you tell one of your friends,
translation.zh: 我打赌每次我们出去玩的时候 你都会告诉你的一个朋友

translation.en: and I can guarantee you that what you don't tell them
translation.zh: 我可以保证 你不告诉他们的是

translation.en: is that every time we hang out,
translation.zh: 每次我们出去玩

translation.en: you are wildly offensive and incredibly inappropriate.
translation.zh: 你都太冒犯了 而且非常不恰当

translation.en: -Well, I'm not-- -[Amira] Oh, and now you're gonna cry.
translation.zh: -我没有… -你现在要哭了

translation.en: You're gonna clutch your pearls and play the victim
translation.zh: 你要掉金豆子了 扮演受害者

translation.en: as if everything I just said, none of that was valid.
translation.zh: 就好像我说的没有一点是真实的

translation.en: My feelings are not valid.
translation.zh: 我的感情是虚假的

translation.en: Your feelings are hurt.
translation.zh: 你的感情受到了伤害

translation.en: -Am I being too aggressive with you? -[splutters]
translation.zh: 我对你太过激进了吗？

translation.en: [Amira] Am I giving you "angry"?
translation.zh: 我是在跟你“生气”吗？

translation.en: The crazy thing is that I really genuinely wanted to get to know you,
translation.zh: 疯狂的是 我真的很想了解你

translation.en: woman to woman.
translation.zh: 女人之间互相了解

translation.en: I thought you would see me.
translation.zh: 我以为你会看到我

translation.en: -That's what I-- -[Amira] No, it's not.
translation.zh: 这就是我… 不 不是

translation.en: Because you can't just see me for me.
translation.zh: 因为你不能为了看到我而去这样做

translation.en: It doesn't matter how many books you read or how many documentaries that you watch,
translation.zh: 不管你看了多少书 或者你看了多少纪录片

translation.en: because at the end of the day, I won't just be Amira to you.
translation.zh: 因为到最后 我对你来不只是阿米拉

translation.en: I'll always be Amira, the Black token daughter-in-law,
translation.zh: 我永远都是阿米拉 黑人象征的儿媳妇

translation.en: and that's ignorant.
translation.zh: 那很无礼

translation.en: Amira, are you okay?
translation.zh: 阿米拉 你没事吧？

translation.en: Not really.
translation.zh: 有事

translation.en: -Miss Shelley, are you okay? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 雪莉女士 你没事吧？

translation.en: All right. Uh, Amira, honey.
translation.zh: 好 阿米拉 亲爱的？

translation.en: [both] Can I talk to you for a second?
translation.zh: 我能跟你谈谈吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: [gasps] You wanna go first?
translation.zh: 你想先说吗？

translation.en: -I do, but it sounds like you do too. -I do. [exhales]
translation.zh: 我想 但听起来你也一样 是的

translation.en: Ezra…
translation.zh: 以斯拉…

translation.en: I don't know how this is gonna work.
translation.zh: 我不知道要怎么样才能走下去

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: [Amira] It's just…
translation.zh: 只是…

translation.en: You know, your family,
translation.zh: 你知道 你的家人

translation.en: my family, the whole thing,
translation.zh: 我的家人 整件事情

translation.en: I don't know if it's supposed to be this hard,
translation.zh: 我不知道是否本来就该这么困难

translation.en: and if I'm being honest, I just…
translation.zh: 不知道我是否在直言不讳 我只是…

translation.en: Oh, God, I don't have it in me.
translation.zh: 天啊 我无法承受

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: Uh, I don't disagree.
translation.zh: 我同意

translation.en: The stuff with our families, like…
translation.zh: 我们家庭的事 就像是…

translation.en: my mom, your dad.
translation.zh: 我妈 你爸

translation.en: Yeah, I guess I don't see it changing, so…
translation.zh: 是啊 我想我没看到有改变 所以…

translation.en: I do, uh, I do want you to know that,
translation.zh: 我想让你知道

translation.en: uh, this time with you has been, like, the happiest time of my life, so…
translation.zh: 和你在一起这段 是我这辈子最开心的时光 所以…

translation.en: I feel the same way. [sobs]
translation.zh: 我也有同感

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: [Ezra] I've been thinking about something you said.
translation.zh: 我一直在想你说的话

translation.en: [Mo] Nigga, if I had a dollar for every time I heard that one.
translation.zh: 兄弟 如果我每次听到 都有一块钱的话

translation.en: [Ezra] You're extremely unlikable. You know that, right?
translation.zh: 你太讨人厌了 你知道的 对吗？

translation.en: -What? -Whoa-ho!
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: [Mo] Anyways, what did I say
translation.zh: 话说 我说了什么话

translation.en: that's been profoundly rattling around in your consciousness?
translation.zh: 一直深刻萦绕在你脑海里？

translation.en: You said that Black people and white people could never be cool,
translation.zh: 你说过黑人和白人永远不合

translation.en: and I think you're right.
translation.zh: 我觉得你是对的

translation.en: [scoffs] Yeah, bro, of course I was right.
translation.zh: 是的 兄弟 我当然是对的

translation.en: I'm always right.
translation.zh: 我总是对的

translation.en: [chuckles] Is that what's bothering you? That I'm always right?
translation.zh: 这是你的困扰吗？我永远是对的？

translation.en: [Ezra] No, what's bothering me is, for a second, I believed you were wrong.
translation.zh: 不 困扰我的是 我有一瞬间觉得你错了

translation.en: That there was hope for us. For the future.
translation.zh: 我们有希望 为了未来

translation.en: [Ezra] That when two people from two different walks of life came together,
translation.zh: 当两个来自不同社会的人走到一起

translation.en: they could get by on their compassion for one another
translation.zh: 他们可能靠他们对彼此的同情

translation.en: and their curiosity and their love.
translation.zh: 和好奇与爱生活

translation.en: But at the end of the day, when it comes to Black and white people,
translation.zh: 但归根结底 说到黑人和白人

translation.en: I don't think love is enough.
translation.zh: 我觉得爱情是不够的

translation.en: There's too many other outside factors.
translation.zh: 其他外在因素太多了

translation.en: Whether it be your friends or your family,
translation.zh: 不管是你的朋友还是家人

translation.en: people can't accept what they don't understand.
translation.zh: 人们无法接受他们不理解的东西

translation.en: Whether it's right is one thing, but factually, it's true.
translation.zh: 是否正确是一回事 但其实是真的

translation.en: We really do live in two worlds.
translation.zh: 我们真的生活在两个世界

translation.en: There's no escaping it.
translation.zh: 这是无法逃避的

translation.en: I was raised by hip-hop shit.
translation.zh: 我是听嘻哈音乐长大的 这让我成为了现在的样子

translation.en: It's made me who I am, but even with that,
translation.zh: 我是听嘻哈音乐长大的 这让我成为了现在的样子 但即便如此

translation.en: I still wasn't prepared for the realities of a world I'm just not from.
translation.zh: 我还是没有准备好 面对我没生活过的另一个世界的现实

translation.en: I'll always be an outsider.
translation.zh: 我会永远都是外人

translation.en: Which is why, as fucked up as this sounds,
translation.zh: 这就是为什么虽然这听起来很混蛋

translation.en: I feel like if you love something,
translation.zh: 我觉得如果你喜欢什么

translation.en: as much as you wanna share it with everybody,
translation.zh: 你很想跟大家分享

translation.en: I think it's best you keep it for yourself.
translation.zh: 我觉得你最好自己留在心里

translation.en: See, I told you. The white Barry White, he be spitting some shit!
translation.zh: 我就说吧 这位白人版巴里·怀特 他在说一些有力的话

translation.en: Him and Joe Rogan.
translation.zh: 他和乔·罗根

translation.en: I ain't mad at Joe Rogan for saying "nigga" every other word,
translation.zh: 我没有因为乔·罗根 每句都说的“黑鬼”生气

translation.en: long as he don't say that shit in my face.
translation.zh: 只要他不当我的面说

translation.en: Man, you kind of dragged bruh a little bit.
translation.zh: 天啊 你有点侮辱他了

translation.en: What are you talking about? Ezra? I ain't drag him.
translation.zh: 你在说以斯拉？我没有侮辱他

translation.en: You drug him like a fat bitch's left foot.
translation.zh: 你侮辱他已经很明显了

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no, you can miss me with all that shit.
translation.zh: 不 你不能指责我

translation.en: I did exactly what any father would do.
translation.zh: 我做了任何父亲都会做的事

translation.en: [chuckles] You played him like a white boy,
translation.zh: 你像一个白人男孩一样耍他

translation.en: 'cause you knew you could get away with it. Tell the truth!
translation.zh: 因为你知道他会忍让 说实话！

translation.en: Oh, you would've handled it differently?
translation.zh: 你会用不同的方式解决？

translation.en: I would've got a car out of his ass.
translation.zh: 我会让他给我买一辆车

translation.en: I'd have probably started me a line of credit,
translation.zh: 我可能会开始给我一个信用卡额度

translation.en: probably got me a washer and dryer, probably a bottle of cologne.
translation.zh: 可能让他给我买洗衣机和烘干机 可能还有一瓶古龙水

translation.en: Try to get my back patio done.
translation.zh: 试着把我的后院修好

translation.en: This is the stuff that he probably wanna do.
translation.zh: 这才是他可能想做的事

translation.en: You in your own reality, huh? That shit ain't gonna happen.
translation.zh: 你在自己的现实中 嗯？ 那种事不会发生的

translation.en: It don't matter what I would've did.
translation.zh: 我想做什么不重要

translation.en: Times have changed. The world is different, Woody.
translation.zh: 时代变了 这个世界不一样了 伍迪

translation.en: Akbar, bitch. My name is Akbar.
translation.zh: 阿克巴 贱人 我叫阿克巴

translation.en: -It's the same amount of syllables-- -See? See?
translation.zh: -音节的数量是一样的… -看吧？

translation.en: You didn't see what I saw.
translation.zh: 你没看到我看到的

translation.en: Him and his friends, the degenerates, was doing so much cocaine in Vegas,
translation.zh: 他和他的朋友 堕落的人 在拉斯维加斯吸很多可卡因

translation.en: it looked like they was doing a reboot of Scarface.
translation.zh: 他们好像在重拍《疤面煞星》

translation.en: So that's what it's about? Cocaine?
translation.zh: 所以就是因为这个？可卡因？

translation.en: Yes, that's one of the main reasons. Yes, cocaine.
translation.zh: 对 这是其中一个主要原因 是的 可卡因

translation.en: He was doing not just cocaine. Lots of cocaine.
translation.zh: 他吸的不只是可卡因 很多可卡因

translation.en: It was copious amounts of cocaine, everywhere.
translation.zh: 到处都是大量的可卡因

translation.en: He did so much cocaine, he shit on hisself!
translation.zh: 他吸了太多可卡因 他拉到自己身上了！

translation.en: -You seen him shit on hisself? -No, I ain't see him shit on hisself.
translation.zh: -你看到他拉在自己身上了？ -不 我没看到

translation.en: But I heard about the other time when he was there and he shit on hisself,
translation.zh: 但我听说他有一次在那里 拉到自己身上了

translation.en: and everybody still talks about it. -So the whole town knows. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 大家都还在谈论 人尽皆知

translation.en: How we gonna be falling in the spot with this nigga?
translation.zh: 我们要怎么跟这个兄弟一起出去？

translation.en: [EJ] Wow.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: Look, I'm not saying it's right, but you did your shit back in the day.
translation.zh: 听着 我没说这是对的 但你以前也做过混事

translation.en: You remember they came out with the Cold Blooded Rick James album?
translation.zh: 你记得他们出了 《冷血》里克·詹姆斯专辑吗？

translation.en: No, I don't remember the Cold Blooded Rick James album.
translation.zh: 不 我不记得《冷血》 里克·詹姆斯专辑

translation.en: Okay, but coke do.
translation.zh: 好吧 但可卡因记得

translation.en: Man, we loved that album.
translation.zh: 天啊 我们喜欢那张专辑

translation.en: That was the only time I felt related to you.
translation.zh: 那是我唯一一次觉得和你有联系

translation.en: And I think you shorted him a little bit.
translation.zh: 我觉得你对他太苛刻了

translation.en: Yeah, you… you shorted him.
translation.zh: 你对他太苛刻了

translation.en: And… And you shorted Amira.
translation.zh: 你对阿米拉也太苛刻了

translation.en: Shorted both of 'em.
translation.zh: 对两个人都是

translation.en: ♪ Where did the day go? ♪
translation.zh: （雪莉·科恩）

translation.en: Can you please stop smiling so big? -You're freaking out the locals. -What?
translation.zh: 拜托你别再大笑了 你吓坏了当地人

translation.en: Well, I'm excited that my son is gonna buy me some tennis shoes.
translation.zh: 我很高兴我儿子要给我买网球鞋

translation.en: [scoffs] I just don't understand why all of a sudden you need a pair of Dunks so badly.
translation.zh: 我不明白你为什么突然需要一双邓克

translation.en: Because Diane Kaplan's son bought her a pair of tennis shoes
translation.zh: 因为黛安·卡普兰的儿子 给她买了一双网球鞋

translation.en: and the bitch won't stop talking about it.
translation.zh: 那个婊子就不停地说

translation.en: Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 靠

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: Oh, well, that's cool. We can just go in and get the shoes, doesn't matter.
translation.zh: 没关系 我们可以进去买鞋子 没事

translation.en: I think you gotta let Diane one up you on this one, Mom. -I don't really wanna-- -[Shelley] It's…
translation.zh: 我觉得你得让黛安这次赢你了 妈妈 我真的不想…

translation.en: Ezra?
translation.zh: 以斯拉？

translation.en: Oh, uh, Amira, what's up, girl?
translation.zh: 阿米拉 你好吗 姑娘？

translation.en: Mm. "What's up, girl"?
translation.zh: “你好吗 姑娘”？

translation.en: Why are you sounding like LL Cool J? What's up?
translation.zh: 你为什么听起来 像是里·库尔·J？ 怎么了？

translation.en: Sorry, I just wasn't expecting to run into you here.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我没想到会在这里遇到你

translation.en: I mean, yeah, same.
translation.zh: 没错 我也是

translation.en: Daddy, what's going on?
translation.zh: 爸爸？怎么回事？

translation.en: Oh, fuck me.
translation.zh: 哦 靠

translation.en: Good timing.
translation.zh: 来得正好

translation.en: Yeah. Okay, I didn't bring you here to buy me shoes.
translation.zh: 对 好吧 我带你来不是给我买鞋子的

translation.en: -Yeah, starting to put that together. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的 开始想明白了

translation.en: Yeah, and, baby girl, I don't know what I told you to get you down here,
translation.zh: 宝贝姑娘 我不知道 我跟你说的什么让你过来了

translation.en: but whatever it was, it was a lie.
translation.zh: 但无论是什么 那都是个谎言

translation.en: The truth is Shelley and I have been talking.
translation.zh: 事实是 我和雪莉一直在谈

translation.en: Yep. Uh, we screwed up, you guys.
translation.zh: 对 我们搞砸了你们

translation.en: -Badly. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -非常糟糕 -对

translation.en: And we feel like we owe y'all some apologies.
translation.zh: 我们觉得我们欠你们一些道歉

translation.en: -Can I go first? -[Shelley] Yeah, please, go, go.
translation.zh: -我可以先来吗？ -好的 拜托

translation.en: Ezra.
translation.zh: 以斯拉

translation.en: Brother.
translation.zh: 兄弟

translation.en: Man, listen.
translation.zh: 哥们 听着

translation.en: I been riding your back from the moment we first met,
translation.zh: 从我们第一次见面开始 我就让你过得很艰难

translation.en: and I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: 'Cause you didn't deserve that.
translation.zh: 因为你不应该被这样对待

translation.en: It's just I couldn't handle the fact that you weren't
translation.zh: 只是我无法忍受你不是

translation.en: what we ever thought Amira would bring home and, uh, you know…
translation.zh: 我们以为的阿米拉会带回家的 人的样子 你知道的…

translation.en: And I never ever thought that I could see my reflection in you, so…
translation.zh: 我从来没想过 我能看到我在你身上的倒影

translation.en: But I do.
translation.zh: 但我看到了

translation.en: And you're a good man.
translation.zh: 你是个好男人

translation.en: And a hustler.
translation.zh: 还是一个骗子

translation.en: And most importantly,
translation.zh: 最重要的是

translation.en: we both love Amira very much, and we'll do anything to make her happy.
translation.zh: 我们都很爱阿米拉 我们为了让她幸福可以付出一切

translation.en: [sighs] Okay, it's my turn.
translation.zh: 好 轮到我了

translation.en: Um, Amira. [inhales] I am so sorry for everything that I did
translation.zh: 阿米拉 我为我所做的一切道歉

translation.en: and said that was offensive to you.
translation.zh: 说了那些冒犯你的话

translation.en: The truth is I… I was just lost.
translation.zh: 其实我只是不知所措

translation.en: You know, my son came home with this beautiful, amazing woman,
translation.zh: 你知道 我儿子带了这个 美丽优秀的女人回家

translation.en: and I didn't know anything about her world.
translation.zh: 而我对她的世界一无所知

translation.en: I mean, I thought I did.
translation.zh: 我是说 我以为我了解

translation.en: And I was just so excited to have a new and different culture in our family,
translation.zh: 我很高兴能在我们家拥有 一个崭新而不同的文化

translation.en: and I just hope that you accept my apology,
translation.zh: 我只是希望你能接受我的道歉

translation.en: because I do apologize on behalf of all white people.
translation.zh: 因为我代表所有白人道歉

translation.en: Except for the racist ones, the actual racist ones.
translation.zh: 除了种族歧视的白人之外 真正的种族歧视

translation.en: -[chuckles] -And on behalf of all Jewish people.
translation.zh: 并代表所有犹太人

translation.en: Except for Aunt Mitzi because…
translation.zh: 除了米兹阿姨 因为…

translation.en: -Yeah, she's racist. -She's actually racist.
translation.zh: -她是种族主义者 -真是种族主义者

translation.en: She's a horrible human being. [sighs]
translation.zh: 她是个很可怕的人

translation.en: But really mostly on behalf of me,
translation.zh: 但主要是代表我

translation.en: Shelley Cohen of Brentwood, California.
translation.zh: 加州布伦特伍德的雪莉·科恩

translation.en: I am so sorry, Amira,
translation.zh: 我很抱歉 阿米拉

translation.en: because I love you and you are not a toy.
translation.zh: 因为我爱你 你不是个玩具

translation.en: I see you as the real, powerful,
translation.zh: 我把你当成真正强大的

translation.en: individual person that you are.
translation.zh: 个人

translation.en: Thank you so much, Miss Shelley, that means a lot to me.
translation.zh: 非常谢谢你 雪莉女士 这对我来说意义重大

translation.en: And I fully receive that.
translation.zh: 我完全接受

translation.en: It felt very genuine and sincere,
translation.zh: 感觉真的很真诚、诚恳

translation.en: so thank you so much.
translation.zh: 所以非常感谢你

translation.en: And, Ezzy.
translation.zh: 还有以斯拉…

translation.en: [exhales] I'm also sorry for always getting in the way.
translation.zh: 我也对一直碍事很抱歉

translation.en: No, you're not.
translation.zh: 不 你没有

translation.en: I'm not, honey, but I love you.
translation.zh: 我没有 亲爱的 但我爱你

translation.en: -Yeah. I love you too. -I love you, baby, very much.
translation.zh: -对 我也爱你 -我爱你 宝贝 非常爱

translation.en: Okay, so…
translation.zh: 好吧 所以…

translation.en: Akbar and I had a little idea.
translation.zh: 阿克巴和我有个小想法

translation.en: Yes, and we think you're both gonna like it very much.
translation.zh: 是的 我们觉得你们俩都会很喜欢

translation.en: A lot.
translation.zh: 非常喜欢

translation.en: So, did you miss me as much as I missed you?
translation.zh: 所以你也像我想你一样想我吗？

translation.en: I missed you so much.
translation.zh: 我很想你

translation.en: I even got a pair of slides the other day 'cause I wanted to feel close to you.
translation.zh: 那天我还买了一双拖鞋 因为我想和你感觉亲近

translation.en: -[laughs] Eww! -They were Umbros. It was all they had.
translation.zh: 运动品牌的 只有那种

translation.en: -I know. -No.
translation.zh: -我知道 -不

translation.en: -I got 'em 'cause I was so sad. -Aww.
translation.zh: 我买那个是因为我很伤心

translation.en: -[Ezra] Missed you. -I missed you too.
translation.zh: -我想你了 -我也想你了

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: [rabbi] Blessings to all who are present
translation.zh: 祝福所有在场见证

translation.en: to witness Ezra and Amira unite their lives in marriage.
translation.zh: 以斯拉和阿米拉喜结连理的人

translation.en: Two hearts as one.
translation.zh: 两颗心合二为一

translation.en: Ezra and Amira, you choose each other to build a home,
translation.zh: 以斯拉和阿米拉 你们选择了彼此来组建家庭

translation.en: not of brick and mortar, but a home and haven in your hearts together.
translation.zh: 不是砖瓦的 而是你们心连心的 一个家和天堂

translation.en: May it be fulfilled each day
translation.zh: 愿你们每天都在这美丽的爱情旅程中

translation.en: as you are on this beautiful journey of love.
translation.zh: 过得充实

translation.en: Just a little heavy on the tongue.
translation.zh: 舌头伸得有点过

translation.en: Most white people do.
translation.zh: 大多数白人都这样

translation.en: Can you believe this is happening?
translation.zh: 你能相信这真的发生了吗？

translation.en: Yep! [laughs]
translation.zh: 是啊！

translation.en: Wow. They look so happy, huh?
translation.zh: 哇 他们看起来真幸福 对吧？

translation.en: -Yeah, they do. -[woman shouts]
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Mr. and Mrs. Cohen.
translation.zh: 科恩夫妇

translation.en: Mr. and Mrs. Mohammad-Cohen.
translation.zh: 穆罕默德-科恩夫妇

translation.en: Yep.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Ain't that a bitch!
translation.zh: 是不是很可以！
